org.gearvrf.accessibility

Class GVRAccessibilityTalkBack

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gearvrf.accessibility.GVRAccessibilityTalkBack

  • public class GVRAccessibilityTalkBack
extends java.lang.Object
    GVRAccessibilityTalkBack responsible for converting the value from a string variable to audio.

      • shutdown

        public void shutdown()
        Interrupts the current utterance (whether played or rendered to file), discards other utterances in the queue and Releases the res ources used by the TextToSpeech engine. It is good practice, for instance, to call this method in the onDestroy() method of an Activity so the TextToSpeech engine can be cleanly stopped.

      • isActive

        public boolean isActive()

      • setActive

        public void setActive(boolean active)

      • getDefaultLocale

        public java.util.Locale getDefaultLocale()
        By default locale is English US.
